argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | lidlabl.l | |- L = ( LIdeal ` R ) |
| 2 |  | lidlabl.i | |- I = ( R |`s U ) |
| 3 |  | #P_ringabl | |- ( R e. Ring -> R e. Abel ) |
| 4 | 3 | #P_adantr | |- ( ( R e. Ring /\ U e. L ) -> R e. Abel ) |
| 5 | 1 | #P_lidlsubg | |- ( ( R e. Ring /\ U e. L ) -> U e. ( SubGrp ` R ) ) |
| 6 | 2 | #P_subgabl | |- ( ( R e. Abel /\ U e. ( SubGrp ` R ) ) -> I e. Abel ) |
| 7 | 4, 5, 6 | #P_syl2anc | |- ( ( R e. Ring /\ U e. L ) -> I e. Abel ) |
